long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience a peak state of focus with the most streamlined pomodoro app ever created.

Taskmade makes pomodoro focus sessions easy to start with just a click. 

And while you're in session, you can see how much time is remaining without any clicks.

Optimized for maximum focus and minimal distraction. That's it.
